(ref: "Big Ben", Slate, October 24, 2005) https://georgewbush-whitehouse.archives.gov/news/nominations/106.html (born December 13, 1953) is an American economist of Jewish descent.www.federalreserve.gov He was the Chair of the Federal Reserve, the central bank of the United States.
